game.name: Story of Animal Sprite
game.shortDescription: Story of Animal Sprite is a casual merge game where you will restore the homeland for cute animals by building various fancy structures.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Story of Animal Sprite is a casual merge game where you will restore the homeland for cute animals by building various fancy structures.

reviewHighlights.text: is there a free merge game on discord ? yes... but does it have cute baby animals that you can use as slaves? I DIDNT THINK SO
A casual little merge game. Buy it on sale, It's very relaxing
